item.description:
I tried the 7-course tasting menu at TW Food last week and it was out of this world!

1. foie gras brulee
2. cauliflower soup with curried gnocci
3. Spatzle with bacon, onion, parsely & emmenthaler
4. Sottish salmon
5. braised beef roulade
6. two cheeses
7. pear pana cotta

The portions are small so you won't be overwhelmed. The menu changes slightly daily according to what's freshest at the market. They're offering it through the end of the month. Cost is $69, well spent. (Also a wine pairing available.) There is also a vegetarian tasting menu.
item.name: TW Food November Tasting Menu
